channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: South Korea To Launch Independent Inquiry Into 2022 Seoul Halloween Crowd Crush
item.description: South Korea is launching an independent investigation into the Seoul Halloween crowd crush in 2022 that claimed the lives of 159 people. Families of the victims have long called fo

item.title: Chiayi Transforms Former Police Station Into Cultural Hub
item.description: A former police station in Chiayi City in southern Taiwan is now officially a cultural hub to give visitors the chance to explore the community's culture and history.

item.title: Hualien Earthquake One Month On: County Becomes Tourism Desert
